Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I haven't given a formal introduction yet, so, here it is!

My name in real life is Lachlan, but you can call me Mr Tiddles.

I bought the game when it was a wee little game, with one screen of parts for everything, only a VAB and a launch pad.

I was a bit disappointing by the game in its early form, for the lack of content, but I was still happy about what they had accomplished in the game, and hoped that this game had a bright future. This was a few years ago. I, one day remembered that I owned the game. And i re-downloaded the game. I think it was V.20. I was amazed at the things they had accomplished, and got myself invested in the game that I couldn't enjoy much all those years ago. I am proud to own this game, and i'm am glad the way things turned out with this game, and I hope that all Squad's projects will turn out as well as Kerbal Space Program did!

I also live in Australia, South Australia, Adelaide. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Anyway, Good luck in everything Squad, and I am glad to be a part of this community!
(Belated) Welcome! Yeah, I started playing ages ago too, but got bored.
